title: Traits and Features
content: 2. Warlock Lvl 2 Armour of Shadows Feature You can cast Mage Armour on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot. One of the nine Eldritch Invocations available at Warlock level 2. Warlock Lvl 2 Beast Speech Feature You can cast Speak with Animals at will, without expending a spell slot. One of the nine Eldritch Invocations available at Warlock level 2. Warlock Lvl 2 Beguiling Influence Feature You invoke your patron's bewitching charm. You gain proficiency in the Deception and Persuasion
